ygData.subject: RE: Neriak Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Not that this will help much, but it may give you an idea of where to look. I know there is a bug that can reset you factions to their beginning levels, but I
ygData.messageBody:
Not that this will help much, but it may give you an idea of where to look.
I know there is a bug that can reset you factions to their beginning levels,
but I don't know how to trigger it. A 50th level DE Necro in my guild
triggered it once, but he doesn't know how he did it either.

Dicey
-----Original Message-----
From: Fottral, Mayo [mailto:mayof@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 2:42 PM
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Neriak Faction


From: "Fottral, Mayo" <mayof@...>

Please if anyone can help me, I am VERY desperate. I have accidentally
messed up my factions with Dark Bargainers so that they are apprehensive.
I
don't know how this happened, but I went from amiable to apprehensive
without even being indifferent!!! But anyway, is there ANY way to get
factions higher with Dark Bargainers that anybody can think of? I tried
Wine quest... won't give it to ya unless you are indiff or better. I
tried
slaves in Crushbone... the woodelf slaves gave me good factions towards
Indigo Brotherhood, but none to Dark Bargainers. Tried the GLS and LS
quest
in South Ro to Smith Tv'ysa but she wouldn't take them or talk to me
either... must have to be indiff here as well. So I finally got a lvl 50
druid (39 - 50 can do this) cast wolf form on me in S. Ro and this made no
difference. She still hated me! So is there any quests anyone can think
of
that would possibly help me here? I am really getting desperate and have
spent hours trying these other things. Thanks a lot!!!

Really paying for this stupid mistake!!!

- Xinuilt
lvl 20 DE on Quillious
